titles.title: To provide for the conveyance of the National Forest System lands underlying the George Kirkpatrick Dam on the Ocklawaha River near Palatka, Florida, and related lands to the State of Florida.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 3/6/2002--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to the State of Florida: (1) National Forest System lands underlying the George Kirkpatrick Dam on the Ocklawaha River near Palatka, Florida; (2) National Forest System lands laying below the 21-feet National Geodetic Vertical Datum underlying the Rodman Reservoir formed by such dam; and (3) National Forest tract #C-615. Conditions such conveyance on the State agreeing to assume responsibility for environmental remediation activities.
